name: Ruby
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your body shifts and reflects brilliant rubies. You gain the following benefits:
* Your current and maximum hit points are increased by 5 times your proficiency modifier.
* Allied creatures within 30 feet add your proficiency modifier to any temporary hit points they gain.
* You can use 2 AP to shine harsh ruby light in a 30 foot cone. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d10 radiant damage per point of proficiency modifier, halved on a success.

Casting another Crystal spell ends this spell immediately.
